I fix things in pixels and ink

Services

From one source, countless outputs

Websites

I build responsive sites that will fit any device, from WordPress sites to static pages.

Print Books

I design and lay out print books.

Ebooks

I transform print books into ebooks. Fixed-Layout, enhancements, or reflowable.

Sentences. Develop a strong foundation.

I have experience editing and reviewing for three literary journals in addition to reading for the Carolyn Jenks Literary Agency. I have a degree in English from the University of Florida and a master’s degree in publishing and writing from Emerson College. I offer one-on-one critiques and more in-depth copyediting.

It’s always good to get a second eye. Contact me for a free consultation.

Pages. Improve your reader’s experience.

You have your content. But that’s not all you’re providing. The value of a book is not just in the content, but in the presentation. Build a more beautiful page.

Reach out to me for a quote on your project.

Here are samples from my portfolio. (Click to embiggen).

Books. Reach out to your readers in ink and in pixels.

I have made print-on-demand and traditional print-ready books, and I make vendor-ready ebooks every day. I make MOBI/KF8 files for Kindle and EPUB3 (with EPUB2 fallbacks) for everyone else.

Contact me to learn more about ebooks or to get a quote on your print book or ebook project. Follow me on Twitter (@NoFrancosPlease) and follow the hashtag #eprdctn.

Here are samples from my portfolio. (Click to embiggen).

Workflows. Don’t think print first. Think content first.

You have everything in place, but your team often hits on snags trying to get into the ebook arena. With my educational background and unique experience in nearly every part of the publishing process, I can step into the role of everyone in your workflow and see where your team can be more efficient and productive.

Make your books future-proof. I can help you do that.

Contact me for more information and a free consultation.
